result.title: Error in code. DSU
result.content:
Hello. I'm trying to solve the problem 500B. Earlier, I solved this problem by using DFS and now I'm trying to solve the problem using DSU. Got a wrong answer on test 15. Please help to localize the error. Link to my submission http://codeforces.com/contest/500/submission/12545323

P.S. Sorry for my bad english :)
